name: Submarine Car Diving Simulator
description:
Your favorite car is underwater now!
Ever wanted to dive into ocean with your car? Want to transform your car into a floating speedboat? Submarine Car Diving Simulator is best for you!
Dive deep and cruise through the endless uncharted nature of the ocean and you will see clownfish, dolphins, penguins and mysterious sea animals. Get close to the sea surface and sail in the open sea with your flying cruise ship. You are free in a world that you can do what you want!

Install now and meet them in their magical worlds!

Submarine Car Diving Simulator - Game Features
- 3 in 1 : Submarine game, Boat game and car game!
- Beautiful ocean landscapes
- Stunning HD Graphics
- Realistic and dynamic car physics
- Realistic underwater submarine physics
- Easy and Free to use
- No WiFi? No Problem.
Submarine Car Diving Simulator is free to play. Additional maps and vehicles requires in-app purchase.
developers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
